name: Mud Golem
description: The Mud Golem has a physical presence reflective of its muddy composition, acting as a sturdy combatant in battle.
memorable: Notable for its impressive resistances and abilities to blind opponents with its Mud Ball attack.
goals: To serve its creator and engage in combat when needed.
relations: Often found in the company of creators or other constructs.
environment: Usually found in settings where its creator operates or in muddy terrains.
strengths: Immunity to poison and psychic damage, along with significant resistances to physical attacks.
weaknesses: Slow movement speed makes it less agile compared to quicker foes.
attacks: Utilizes Multiattack for two slam attacks and the Mud Ball ranged attack to hinder opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Magic Resistance allows it to withstand spells and magical effects.
additional_information: Immutable Form renders it immune to effects that change its shape.
Can understand languages but cannot speak.
Blinded condition inflicts strategic disadvantages on targets.
Significant physical damage potential with slam attacks.
test_queries: construct with magical resistance and slow speed
small sturdy mud monster with slam attacks
enemy that uses mud attacks and immune to shape change
golem designed for combat with poison immunity
